name: sumbandila_app
description: This zip contains: - frontend/  -> Expo app (SDK 54.0.6) (React Native) - backend/   -> Node/Express mock microservice

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm start --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.android: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run android --prefix frontend"
scripts.start:tunnel: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run tunnel --prefix frontend"
scripts.start:lan: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm start --prefix backend" "cd frontend && npx expo start --lan -c"
scripts.start:usb: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm start --prefix backend" "cd frontend && npx expo start --localhost"

author: Raphasha27
